body_text: What are the instances where a Weekly Shounen Jump serialized manga would not be released in a given week? What are the instances that there is no manga (like Naruto, Bleach and One Peace) release? Are there certain events that prevent them from releasing? Then what are these events (aside from taking a break)? Is there some sort of calendar of events for this?.

When are the annual breaks for Weekly Shonen Jump? After looking for the new chapter of One Piece, I came across this site. Here they said
Remembering the golden week from begin May, it made me wonder what other annual breaks mangakas have and when we shouldn't expect a new release to come out.
